question.question: Safari Logistics operates scheduled flights every day in the high season (May - October) and on Tuesdays, Thursdays & Sunday in the low season (November to April). There is a baggage restriction of how many kg per person in a soft duffle bag? (tap on the button to start the automatic slider).
question.correct: You are right. There is a baggage restriction of 20 kg per person in a soft duffle bag.

quiz.finish: Congratulations, you have successfully completed Chapter 4: Safari Logistics and passed another portion of the Safari Master™ Exam.
